meanings.definition: The act of representing in a figure or in a design.
meanings.sent1: The artist's figurations on the canvas were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The figurations in the painting captured the essence of nature.
meanings.sent3: The figurations in the artwork seemed to dance across the page.
meanings.sent4: Her figurations of animals were so lifelike, they almost seemed to breathe.
meanings.sent5: The intricate figurations in the sculpture left viewers in awe.

meanings.definition: The act of shaping or molding.
meanings.sent1: The potter's skilled figurations turned clay into beautiful vases.
meanings.sent2: The figurations of the clay into various shapes were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent3: The figurations of the dough into different animals brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: His figurations of metal created stunning sculptures that adorned the park.
meanings.sent5: The figurations of the sandcastle showed intricate details and precision in every corner.
